text: The Pride of the Yankees is a 1942 American biographical drama movie directed by Sam Wood and starring Gary Cooper, Teresa Wright, Walter Brennan, Babe Ruth, Bill Dickey, Dan Duryea, Pierre Watkin, Hardie Albright, Addison Richards, Edward Fielding. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures and was nominated for 11 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1943. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1942 drama movies Category:1940s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sam Wood Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: The Pride of the Yankees
